tool_description: API showing all the news in NBA
title: Nba News

api_list.name: Get all NBA news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-news.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
